attributes.action: ban all talk of global warming, the environment and carbon footprints
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I can't be the only one finding this overblown fictional rubbish incredibly tedious right now.

Ban all this talk now please. 

Offenders to be beaten with carbon sticks.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
